play

public int play(UNO_Card card,
                boolean useColorInstead)
sends cards off to the correct play() method

Specified by:
play in class Player
Parameters:
card - The top card on the discard pile.
useColorInstead - If true this flag indicates that the player should query the dealer for the current color and use this information instead of card on top of the draw pile to make their play. If false, use the card passed via the card parameter as the top card on the draw pile.
Returns:
The number of cards remaining in the players hand after the player object has played.
